declarationSection.title: Submit form to register the business for Fuel Duty

fields.infoText: By submitting this form you are confirming that all the information you’ve provided is correct and complete.

We will review your form.

##If you’re EPSS approved



You must provide a copy of your EPSS
Approval letter and a completed SIVA2 form.



 



##If you’re not EPSS approved



You’ll need to appoint a guarantor.
You must complete the Guarantee deferment of payment to HMRC (C1201) form and
send it to HMRC.

##How to set up a Direct Debit for your return payments 
If you would like to set up a Direct Debit for your return payments, you’ll also need to complete a Set up a Direct Debit to pay deferred duty on imports and excise goods (C1202) form (opens in a new window) and send it to HMRC.

##How to apply for a deferment
If you would like to apply for a deferment, you’ll also need to print and post a Guarantee deferment of payment to HMRC (C1201) form (opens in a new window).
